name: Type II error rate
formula: $\beta = P(\text{fail to reject } H_0 | H_1 \text{ true})$

name: Shannon entropy
description: Information content of a random variable; foundation of information theory

name: Mann-Whitney U
formula: U statistic for two independent samples

name: Sign test
formula: Binomial test on signs of differences

name: Percentile (definition)
formula: Value below which p% of data fall

name: Agresti-Coull interval
formula: Add 2 successes and 2 failures then Wald interval
